summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5399 for the maintenance of The Center Parking Strip in 43rd Avenue Northeast, from East 38th Street to East 45th Street; for a period of five (5) years, under Ordinance No. 67061, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
